summary: This bill, the Honoring Our Fallen Heroes Act of 2025, amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide public safety officer benefits for exposure-related cancers. It establishes a presumption that exposure to carcinogens in the line of duty results in death or disability, lists specific cancers covered, and outlines a process for adding more.  It also addresses confidentiality of information related to benefits claims and makes technical amendments to existing legislation.
